# Preface {-}

For the preparatory class of MSc students at CUHK in 2017.

This course is at the level of [Casella and Berger (2008): Statistical Inference.](https://www.amazon.com/Statistical-Inference-George-Casella/dp/8131503941/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1502510243&sr=8-1&keywords=casella+berger) Another textbook for more technical development is
[Durrent (2010): Probability: Theory and Examples.](https://www.amazon.com/Probability-Cambridge-Statistical-Probabilistic-Mathematics/dp/0521765390/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1502510600&sr=1-1&keywords=Probability%3A+Theory+and+Examples)

## Prerequisite {-}
Standard Chinese undergraduate programs offer two semesters' calculus, one semester's linear
algebra and one semester's probability and statistics for students majoring in economics or finance.
All these are necessary.
